"If you want to stop Unicron, why don't you just take
the slagging Matrix to him, and open it like Optimus
Prime did?"  She had no idea why she was suggesting
that two such sources of Destiny energy wipe each
other out, but she doubted the Decepticon would have
simply be oblivious to the option.

OOC: Has the council begun discussion on the Deviner's
limitations, or is it just a big topic of debate

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "No, there is no 'divided' Matrix.  Most Decepticons
> and appearently Pedacons assume leadership through
> force and brutality.  Just as the Autobot Matrix
> allowed Optimus Prime to give life to the Dinobots
> and others, the Decepticon Matrix allows me to do
> the same.  I have spent time working with my Matrix,
> and developed the ability to read any Decepticon's
> spark."
> A series of locks unlatched and Megatron Revived
> pulled the Matrix out.  The gold, ornate housing
> held inside a pulsating red crystal, the actual
> Matrix.  The clone held it firmly in his hands, so
> no one could take it, if they were dumb enough to
> try.
> "This is THE Decepticon Matrix of Leadership."
>
